description: Unique identifier for each Condition Era record.
comment: Primary Key for the CONDITION_ERA table.

description: Identifier of the Person to whom the Condition Era applies.
Start date of the Condition Era. Defined as the earliest chronologically recorded condition occurrence with at least a 30-day persistence window since any prior occurrence of the same condition.
comment: Start date of continuous condition era.

description: End date of the Condition Era. Defined as the end date of the final continuously recorded condition occurrence.
comment: End date of continuous condition era.

description: Number of CONDITION_OCCURRENCE records grouped into this Condition Era.
comment: Count of contributing condition occurrence records.
